nodes.text: Garqi Agricultural University, also known as Garqi Ag University or Garqi Ag, was the leading university on Garqi. It was located in the capital city of Pesktda, and was a center of anti-Imperial sentiment during the Galactic Civil War. During the Yuuzhan Vong War, it was used by the Yuuzhan Vong as an assembly area for Thrall.
Geonosis and the Outer Rim Worlds
